Entries.winter_4: I have an appointment at the clinic today.#$e#I'll be back home in the afternoon.

Entries.jobLeave_Penny: #$c .5#Look like it's raining today.#Looks like it's another day off. The kids don't have classes when it rains.#$e#$c .5#I think I'm gonna go to the library still. Not to sound mean, but it's a lot more peaceful without the kids.$h#I hope Vincent and Jas don't forget the material we studied when we return.$s
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#The library is really peaceful when it's raining. You should come with me sometime.

Entries.jobLeave_Penny: I'll be out in town today, dear. I hope you take the time to enjoy yourself too.$h
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#Hi, dear! I've missed you.$h

Entries.jobLeave_Penny: Aww... It's raining on my day off.$s#$e#Oh, well. Just gives me an excuse to go back to the library!
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#The library is really peaceful when it's raining. You should come with me sometime.
